sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_macro_38d392ca97560e50f87eba77f053afcb
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_macro"><sys_ui_macro action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><category>general</category><description>Retrieves update sets from dev instance button for use on CICD Form catalog item </description><media_type/><name>Retrieve update sets</name><scoped_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_macro</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>julian.gonzalez@cohesity.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-22 16:44:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>38d392ca97560e50f87eba77f053afcb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Retrieve update sets</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_macro_38d392ca97560e50f87eba77f053afcb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>julian.gonzalez@cohesity.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-22 18:42:15</sys_updated_on><xml><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

	<style>
		#retrieveBtn{
			align-items: center;
			background-color: #67BF1B;
			border: 1px solid transparent;
			border-color: RGB(var(--now-button--secondary--border-color,var(--now-color--neutral-7,135,147,148)));
			color: #fff;
			border-radius: 4px;
			//border: none;
			box-shadow: none;
			cursor: pointer;
			display: inline-flex;
			font-size: var(--now-global-font-size--md, 14px);
			font-weight: 700;
			height: 32px;
			justify-content: center;
			line-height: 1;
			padding: 0 var(--now-global-space--md,10px);
			text-decoration: none;
			transition: background-color .3s cubic-bezier(.075, .82, .165, 1),border-color .3s cubic-bezier(.075, .82, .165, 1),box-shadow .3s cubic-bezier(.075, .82, .165, 1),color .3s cubic-bezier(.075, .82, .165, 1),opacity .3s cubic-bezier(.075, .82, .165, 1),transform .1s cubic-bezier(.77, 0, .175, 1);
			user-select: none;
			white-space: nowrap;
		}


		#retrieveBtn:focus, #retrieveBtn:hover{
			box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 2px RGB(var(--now-color_focus-ring,var(--now-color--secondary-1,1,119,142))),inset 0 0 0 3px RGB(var(--now-color_focus-ring_shadow,var(--now-color_background--primary,var(--now-color--neutral-0,255,255,255))));
			outline: 0;
		}

		#retrieveBtn:active{
			outline: 0;
			text-decoration: none;
			transition: none
		}

	</style>

	<button id="retrieveBtn" onclick="handleClick()">Retrieve Update Sets</button>

	<script>

		function handleClick(){

			var sysId = 'af81329bc37d6150c59e97af050131d0';

			var dialogClass = window.GlideModal ? GlideModal : GlideDialogWindow;
			var dd = new dialogClass("hierarchical_progress_viewer", false, "40em", "10.5em");
			dd.setTitle("Retrieve Update Sets");
			dd.setPreference('sysparm_ajax_processor', 'UpdateSetAjax');
			dd.setPreference('sysparm_type', 'retrieveUpdateSets');
			dd.setPreference('sysparm_id', sysId);
			dd.setPreference('sysparm_renderer_expanded_levels', '0'); // collapsed root node by default
				
			dd.setPreference('sysparm_button_close', "Close");
				
			dd.on("executionStarted", function(response) {
			var trackerId = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
				var cancelBtn = new Element("button", {
					'id': 'sysparm_button_cancel',
					'type': 'button',
					'class': 'btn btn-default',
					'style': 'margin-left: 5px; float:right;'
				}).update("Cancel");
				
				cancelBtn.onclick = function() {
					var dialog = new GlideDialogWindow('glide_ask_standard');
					dialog.setTitle("Confirmation");
					dialog.setPreference('warning', true);
					dialog.setPreference('title', "Are you sure you want to cancel this update set retrieve?");
					dialog.setPreference('defaultButton', 'ok_button');
					dialog.setPreference('onPromptComplete', function() {
						cancelBtn.disable();
						var ajaxHelper = new GlideAjax('UpdateSetAjax');
						ajaxHelper.addParam('sysparm_type', 'cancelRetrieve');
						ajaxHelper.addParam('sysparm_tracker_id', trackerId);
						ajaxHelper.getXMLAnswer(_handleCancelRetrieveResponse);
					});
					dialog.render();
					dialog.on("bodyrendered", function() {
						var okBtn = $("ok_button");
						if (okBtn) {
							okBtn.className += " btn-destructive";
						}
					});
				};
				
				var _handleCancelRetrieveResponse = function(answer) {
					var cancelBtn = $("sysparm_button_cancel");
					if (cancelBtn)
						cancelBtn.remove();
				};

				var buttonsPanel = $("buttonsPanel");
				if (buttonsPanel)
					buttonsPanel.appendChild(cancelBtn);
			});
			
			dd.on("bodyrendered", function(trackerObj) {
					var closeBtn = $("sysparm_button_close");
					if (closeBtn)
						closeBtn.disable();
			});
				
			dd.on("executionComplete", function(trackerObj) {
				var closeBtn = $("sysparm_button_close");
				if (closeBtn) {
					closeBtn.enable();
					closeBtn.onclick = function() {
						dd.destroy();
						reloadWindow(window);
					};
				}
				
				var cancelBtn = $("sysparm_button_cancel");
				if (cancelBtn)
					cancelBtn.remove();
			});
			
			dd.render();

		}

	</script>

</j:jelly>]]></xml></sys_ui_macro></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sc_cat_item_d7a04d35971e8a50f87eba77f053afe0
sys_update_xml.payload:
restrictedtrueon_desktopfalse01970-01-03 00:00:00A continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline is a series of steps that must be performed in order to deliver a new version of software. CI/CD pipelines are a practice focused on improving software delivery throughout the software development life cycle via automation. 

This form is intended for the ServiceNow Delivery team to expedite the delivery process for enhancements to the platform.

To submit this form, you will need to provide Story/Epic Numbers, Update Sets, and users who are involved with the enhancement.

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="CICD Form">d7a04d35971e8a50f87eba77f053afe0</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:b5814575971e8a50f87eba77f053af9a</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Populate update sets</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    var story = newValue;

	g_form.showFieldMsg('story', 'If you do not see the update set fields auto-populate, press "Retrieve Update Sets" button. The page will reload upon completion. If no update sets are found make sure the are marked "Complete".', 'info', true);

    var ajax = new GlideAjax('Cohesity_CICD');
    ajax.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getUpdateSets');
    ajax.addParam('sysparm_storyId', story);
    ajax.getXML(getUpdateSets);

    function getUpdateSets(response) {
        var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");

        g_form.setValue('update_sets', answer);
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>julian.gonzalez@cohesity.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-22 20:03:03</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4bce3a4e971a0e50f87eba77f053af78</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate update sets</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_4bce3a4e971a0e50f87eba77f053af78</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>julian.gonzalez@cohesity.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-22 20:50:02</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_9d29d4e997164a50f87eba77f053afc5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.Cohesity_CICD</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>Cohesity_CICD</name><script><![CDATA[var Cohesity_CICD = Class.create();
Cohesity_CICD.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    STORY_ENDPOINT: 'https://cohesity.service-now.com/api/now/table/rm_story?sysparm_query=sys_class_name%3Drm_story%5Esys_created_on%3E%3Djavascript%3Ags.beginningOfYesterday()',

    UPDATE_SET_ENDPOINT: 'https://cohesitydev.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_update_set?sysparm_query=sys_id%3D',

    USERNAME: 'CICD Integration User',
    PASSWORD: 'X}e)8jk-;u)6qHEU^meIvb]QKqvw9dY]Esrl$Ed{]NfS;GuK0K2PU$3iD2-#^oIEwvqz([3li{rr,I;F-,m1mk7p){ET-,V3l]oC',

    syncStories: function() {
        var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        restMessage.setEndpoint(this.STORY_ENDPOINT);
        restMessage.setHttpMethod('GET');
        restMessage.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
        restMessage.setBasicAuth(this.USERNAME, this.PASSWORD);

        var response = restMessage.execute();

        var payload = JSON.parse(response.getBody());
        var status = response.getStatusCode();
        var stories = payload.result;

        stories.forEach(function(story) {
            // Recreate stories in dev using SYS ID in Prod
            var toyStory = new GlideRecord('rm_story');
            toyStory.initialize();
            toyStory.number = story.number;
            toyStory.epic = story.epic;
            toyStory.state = story.state;
            toyStory.story_points = story.story_points;
            toyStory.sprint = story.sprint;
            toyStory.product = story.product;
            toyStory.release = story.release;
            toyStory.assignment_group = story.assignment_group;
            toyStory.assigned_to = story.assigned_to;
            toyStory.u_product_owner = story.u_product_owner;
            toyStory.short_description = story.short_description;
            toyStory.description = story.description;
            toyStory.acceptance_criteria = story.acceptance_criteria;
            toyStory.setNewGuidValue(story.sys_id);
            toyStory.insert();
        });


        if (status.toString() != '200') {
            return 'Code: ' + status + '\n' + 'Error Message ' + response.getErrorMessage();
        }
        return status;
    },

    // Query DEV instance for the related story
    // on the update set table
    getStoryID: function(sys_id) {
        var updateSetID = sys_id != null ? sys_id : this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id');

        var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        restMessage.setEndpoint(this.UPDATE_SET_ENDPOINT + updateSetID);
        restMessage.setHttpMethod('GET');
        restMessage.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
        restMessage.setBasicAuth(this.USERNAME, this.PASSWORD);

        var response = restMessage.execute();

        var payload = JSON.parse(response.getBody());
        var status = response.getStatusCode();
        var story_id = payload.result[0].u_story.value;


        if (status.toString() != '200') {
            return 'Code: ' + status + '\n' + 'Error Message ' + response.getErrorMessage();
        }
        return story_id;
    },

    getUpdateSets: function(storyId) {
		var story_id   = storyId != null ? storyId : this.getParameter('sysparm_storyId');
        var updateSets = [];

        var remoteSet = new GlideRecord('sys_remote_update_set');
        remoteSet.addEncodedQuery('sys_class_name=sys_remote_update_set^u_story=' + story_id);
        remoteSet.query();

        while (remoteSet.next()) {
            updateSets.push(remoteSet.getUniqueValue());
        }
		return updateSets.toString();
    },

    type: 'Cohesity_CICD'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>julian.gonzalez@cohesity.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-20 18:30:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>9d29d4e997164a50f87eba77f053afc5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Cohesity_CICD</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9d29d4e997164a50f87eba77f053afc5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>julian.gonzalez@cohesity.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-22 23:02:35</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sc_cat_item_d7a04d35971e8a50f87eba77f053afe0
sys_update_xml.payload:
restrictedtrueon_desktopfalse01970-01-03 00:00:00A continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline is a series of steps that must be performed in order to deliver a new version of software. CI/CD pipelines are a practice focused on improving software delivery throughout the software development life cycle via automation. 

This form is intended for the ServiceNow Delivery team to expedite the delivery process for enhancements to the platform.

To submit this form, you will need to provide Story/Epic Numbers, Update Sets, and users who are involved with the enhancement.

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="chg_model"><chg_model action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><advanced_security>false</advanced_security><available_in_ui>false</available_in_ui><color>#cbcbcb</color><default_change_model>false</default_change_model><description>Continuous integration and continuous delivery change model</description><implementation_states/><name>CICD</name><read_roles>admin</read_roles><record_preset>type=standard^assignment_group=6fc95c858720ad10c028caad0ebb35dd^category=Software^cmdb_ci=890ef999c33d2910c59e97af050131eb^justification=To further improve and mature the Cohesity ServiceNow platform in alignment with the stakeholders requirements.^implementation_plan=Following the standardized ServiceNow update set deployment steps.
- Import Update Set from Test
- Confirm/Review Errors from Imported Update Set
- Stakeholder will Validate functionality is in Prod^risk_impact_analysis=The updates to the ServiceNow Production environment will have minimum negative impacts and only those users leveraging the part of the platform during the release will experience a degradation in service in the form of slowness.^backout_plan=If production validation is rejected, then ServiceNow's standard update set back out steps will automatically be initiated, and the functionality will be reverted to the previous version.^test_plan=The Stakeholder will validate the new functionality has been deployed successfully.^EQ</record_preset><state_field>state</state_field><sys_class_name>chg_model</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>julian.gonzalez@cohesity.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-28 04:20:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>cf13aa7f979e0690f87eba77f053af45</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CICD</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>chg_model_cf13aa7f979e0690f87eba77f053af45</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>julian.gonzalez@cohesity.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-28 15:04:18</sys_updated_on><table_name>change_request</table_name><write_roles>admin</write_roles></chg_model><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=cf13aa7f979e0690f87eba77f053af45"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_remote_update_set</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Copy Story reference</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Copy the story reference from the
	// update set to the remote update set
	var story_id = new Cohesity_CICD().getStoryID(current.origin_sys_id);
	current.u_story = story_id;

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>julian.gonzalez@cohesity.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-21 19:39:29</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b052f1f997de8a50f87eba77f053afe4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Copy Story reference</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b052f1f997de8a50f87eba77f053afe4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>julian.gonzalez@cohesity.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-21 21:27:35</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b052f1f997de8a50f87eba77f053afe4"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_9d29d4e997164a50f87eba77f053afc5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.Cohesity_CICD</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>Cohesity_CICD</name><script><![CDATA[var Cohesity_CICD = Class.create();
Cohesity_CICD.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    STORY_ENDPOINT: 'https://cohesity.service-now.com/api/now/table/rm_story?sysparm_query=sys_class_name%3Drm_story%5Esys_created_on%3E%3Djavascript%3Ags.beginningOfYesterday()',

    UPDATE_SET_ENDPOINT: 'https://cohesitydev.service-now.com/api/now/table/sys_update_set?sysparm_query=sys_id%3D',

    USERNAME: 'CICD Integration User',
    PASSWORD: 'X}e)8jk-;u)6qHEU^meIvb]QKqvw9dY]Esrl$Ed{]NfS;GuK0K2PU$3iD2-#^oIEwvqz([3li{rr,I;F-,m1mk7p){ET-,V3l]oC',

    syncStories: function() {
        var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        restMessage.setEndpoint(this.STORY_ENDPOINT);
        restMessage.setHttpMethod('GET');
        restMessage.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
        restMessage.setBasicAuth(this.USERNAME, this.PASSWORD);

        var response = restMessage.execute();

        var payload = JSON.parse(response.getBody());
        var status = response.getStatusCode();
        var stories = payload.result;

        stories.forEach(function(story) {
            // Recreate stories in dev using SYS ID in Prod
            var toyStory = new GlideRecord('rm_story');
            toyStory.initialize();
            toyStory.number = story.number;
            toyStory.epic = story.epic;
            toyStory.state = story.state;
            toyStory.story_points = story.story_points;
            toyStory.sprint = story.sprint;
            toyStory.product = story.product;
            toyStory.release = story.release;
            toyStory.assignment_group = story.assignment_group;
            toyStory.assigned_to = story.assigned_to;
            toyStory.u_product_owner = story.u_product_owner;
            toyStory.short_description = story.short_description;
            toyStory.description = story.description;
            toyStory.acceptance_criteria = story.acceptance_criteria;
            toyStory.setNewGuidValue(story.sys_id);
            toyStory.insert();
        });


        if (status.toString() != '200') {
            return 'Code: ' + status + '\n' + 'Error Message ' + response.getErrorMessage();
        }
        return status;
    },

	// Query DEV instance for the related story
	// on the update set table
    getStoryID: function(sys_id) {
		var updateSetID = sys_id != null ? sys_id : this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id');

        var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        restMessage.setEndpoint(this.UPDATE_SET_ENDPOINT + updateSetID);
        restMessage.setHttpMethod('GET');
        restMessage.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
        restMessage.setBasicAuth(this.USERNAME, this.PASSWORD);

        var response = restMessage.execute();

        var payload = JSON.parse(response.getBody());
        var status = response.getStatusCode();
        var story_id = payload.result[0].u_story.value;


        if (status.toString() != '200') {
            return 'Code: ' + status + '\n' + 'Error Message ' + response.getErrorMessage();
        }
        return story_id;
    },

    type: 'Cohesity_CICD'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>julian.gonzalez@cohesity.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-20 18:30:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>9d29d4e997164a50f87eba77f053afc5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Cohesity_CICD</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9d29d4e997164a50f87eba77f053afc5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>julian.gonzalez@cohesity.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-21 21:25:51</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
